This function is used to control the ambient light of a scene, which is the light that you have in a scene even without having defined any point or directional light sources. It is effectively the overall colour and brightness (or darkness) of a scene. The default colour is <tt>c_black</tt>.
The colour to use (either a constant, a real or a hex value).
The above code will define the ambient lighting as being white.
